title: Fork, ca. 1760
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Fork has two tines. Scale pattern around shoulder. Baluster neck, pistol-butt handle with overall spiral pattern. End domed with molded concentric rings and central button.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1760.
ca. 1760. steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-18.
